KitKat::

She slept soundly as she was placed in her quarters.  She turned over 
and transformed into wolf mode in her sleep.  She moaned and muttered 
in her sleep, tossed and turned as her mind reeled in visions that 
would make Unicron scared. 

She finally woke up and got out of bed.  She stretched her front paws 
out and arched her back.  She walked out of her room and was about to 
go to the mess hall. She stopped dead in her tracks as her optics 
widened with the a thought. "I didn't go to bed last night. I was in 
the lab. How in the pit did I make it to my room if I never left the 
lab?"  She went back to her room. She could sniff the scent of Malice 
still lingering on the side of the bed where he brushed up putting 
her on it. She grinned and starting back to the mess hall. "Uh huh, 
yeah, he's a softy alright. But I won't let him know that I know 
that."  She muttered to herself.  She went to the mess hall and 
transformed into bot mode. She got herself some hot energon and sat 
down at a table, trying to wake up.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice was jolted awake from Campflage's sream, and fell off his 
bed with a very loud thud.  He picked himself up off the floor and 
stood up too fast, stumbled a second, then went out the door.  He 
went looking for Camoflage, but was unsucessful.  He then found 
Wolfblade fast asleep at a work bench.  He picked her up and took her 
to his quarters.  He set he on the bed and retrieved the generator 
she was working on.  He set it on the night stand, and went to the 
cargo bay.  He found a cargo net strong enough to support his 
weight.  He took it back to his quarters, string it up as a hammock, 
grabbed the alarm clock, climbed into the hammock, hit the lights, 
and went to sleep.
> 
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:Wolfblade:
> She yawned and kept working.  Her energy levels were dropping and 
she 
> would need to sleep soon. Still, she faught it off and kept 
working. 
> After a bit, she went to the other bench and grabbed a stool to sit 
> on. She sat down and kept working. In a few hours, she was leaning 
> over the magnet, sound asleep. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice yawned and patted Wolfblade on her shoulder.
> > "See you in a few cycles.  If you do get tired, talk to Kup or 
> someone, they should set you up with a room.  Goodnight."
> > Malice walked down some halls and found his way to his temporary 
> quarters.  He opened the door and stepped in.  He sat down on the 
> edge of the bed, and sat quiet for a moment.  then he pulled the 
> energon storage and put it on top of the locker.  He opened the 
> locker and snapped off another chunk of energon.  He leaned back on 
> the bed, crunching on the energon.  He finished it, found an alarm 
> clock, set it, and went to sleep.
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade::
> > 
> > She worked trying to put together the magnet and improve it to 
work 
> > for it's purpose. "No thanks. I'm not tired. I have work to 
do."Her 
> > voice was short and curt.  She then looked up at Malice and said 
in 
> a 
> > softer tone, "I can't blame you. I'd have done the same thing. I 
> > wouldn't admit it though."  She looked back at the table and 
> resumed 
> > her work. 
> > 
> > 
>
